summary: The Autonomy for Disabled Veterans Act (H.R. 2245) amends Title 38 of the United States Code to increase the financial assistance provided to disabled veterans for home health service improvements and structural alterations. It raises the maximum amounts payable under Section 1717(a)(2) of the Code and mandates annual adjustments for inflation based on the Consumer Price Index. The bill specifies applicability and clarifies eligibility for benefits.
